name: Emieye α
description:
Description:

This is a low-poly game that was created with the intention of repeating Unturned, but ended up with a similar but different game.

The game has:

- 2 survival maps.
- Lots of melee and ranged weapons. (58)
- Transport
- Many cities
- Mechanics of radiation and others
- Smart zombies.

The screenshots show everything in detail.

Controls: WASD - Move Ctrl - Crouch C - Down R - Reload LMB - Attack1 RMB - Attack2 E - Use TAB - Inventory
